item.title: GSEG Executive Board
item.description: Aalok Thakkar (PhD CIS) (President) Anamil Mehta (MSE MEAM) (Vice President) Clary Rodriguez (PhD CBE) (Chair for Finance) Sourajit Das (PhD ESE) (Chair for Finance) GÃ©nesis Quiles-Galarza (PhD CBE) (Chair for Social Programming) Max Li (MSE ESE) (Chair for Social Programming) Pankti Parekh (MSE ESE) (Chair for Logistics)

item.title: GSEG-Representatives to GAPSA
item.description: Bhavya Bhardwaj (MSE BE) Jal Panchal (MSE ROBO) Xinfan Su (Fiona) (MSE ESE) Zhaosen Guo (MSE DATS) Ivy Dai (PhD CBE) Ludwig Zhao (PhD BE) Steven Neuhaus (PhD MSE)

About The Graduate Students' Engineering Government (GSEG) serves a four-fold purpose for graduate and professional students at the School of Engineering and Applied Sciences (SEAS): Representation: GSEG represents the engineering students at various platforms including, but not limited to, University Council, SEAS Graduate Advisory Council (GAC), and the Graduate and Professional Student Assembly (GAPSA) [link to GAPSA reps]. Advocacy: Through its many initiatives, GSEG strives to remove barriers that impede student’s abilities to make the best of their Penn experience.

Advocacy: Through its many initiatives, GSEG strives to remove barriers that impede student’s abilities to make the best of their Penn experience.
